On Thu, 10 Apr 2003, Bernd wrote:

> But AFAIR Kent only recomends [leave last test failing] for single
> person projects (which is what I do currently)

I don't see why it wouldn't work fine on multi-person-projects. Just
don't commit the failing tests.
